title: The great bragge and challenge of M. Champion a Jesuite co[m]monlye called Edmunde Campion, latelye arriued in Englande, contayninge nyne articles here seuerallye laide downe, directed by him to the lordes of the Counsail, / co[n]futed & aunswered by Meredith Hanmer ...
author: Campion, Edmund, Saint, 1540-1581.
publicationPlace: Inprinted [sic] at London in Fletestreate nere vnto Sayncte Dunstons Church :
